Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees played the Texas Rangers in their last series and lost two of three games but won the opener against Chicago.
The Yankees kept their momentum with a 2-0 shutout win on Saturday.
Gerrit Cole will start for the Yankees, with a 6-3 record and a 3.65 ERA in 13 starts this year.
Jameson Taillon will start for the Cubs, with a 9-8 record and a 3.66 ERA in 24 starts this year.
Five of the Yankees' last six games after playing the previous day have gone over the total runs line.
Each of the Cubs' last four home games against AL East opponents have gone under the total runs line.
